attention2.ptxt: The fault is present because the vehicle speed is higher than 5 km/h (3.2 mile/h) while diesel particulate filter after-sales regeneration is in progress.
The vehicle speed should be zero during the regeneration.

item.ptxt: Conditions for applying fault finding procedures to stored faults:
The fault becomes present during an diesel particulate filter after-sales regeneration with the SUZUKI scan and a non negligible speed.
If the fault is present, the diesel particulate filter after-sales regeneration is failed in progress.

entry.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position and wait 1 minute.
Turn ignition switch to ON position.
Clear DTC referring to DTC Clearance:F9Q .
Carry out an after sales regeneration referring to Diesel Particulate Filter After-Sales Regeneration Procedure:F9Q .
If the fault is still present, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
